mapper.sql: id, username, password, nickname, email, phone, status, createDate
mapper.select: select roleId from user_role where userId=#{userId}
select g.* from user_group ug left join groupz g on (ug.groupId=g.id) where ug.userId=#{userId}
select groupId from user_group where userId=#{userId}

select ur.id, ur.userId , ur.roleId , u.username , u.password , u.nickname , u.email , u.phone , u.status , r.name , r.roleType from user_role ur left join role r on (ur.roleId=r.id) left join user u on(ur.userId=u.id) where ur.userId=#{userId} and ur.roleId=#{roleId}

select ug.id, ug.userId , ug.groupId , u.username , u.password , u.nickname , u.email , u.phone , u.status , g.name , g.descr from user_group ug left join groupz g on (ug.groupId=g.id) left join user u on(ug.userId=u.id) where ug.userId=#{userId} and ug.groupId=#{groupId}
select u.* from user_role ur left join user u on(ur.userId=u.id) where ur.roleId=#{roleId}
select u.* from user_role ur join user u on(ur.userId=u.id) join role r on(ur.roleId=r.id) where r.roleType=#{roleType}
select u.* from user_group ug join user u on(ug.userId=u.id) join groupz g on(ug.groupId=g.id) where g.id=#{gid}
mapper.delete: delete from user_role where userId=#{userId} and roleId=#{roleId}
delete from user_group where userId=#{userId} and groupId=#{groupId}
mapper.insert: insert into user (username, password, nickname, email, phone, status,createDate) values(#{user.username},#{user.password},#{user.nickname},#{user.email},#{user.phone},#{user.status},#{user.createDate})
mapper.update: update user set username=#{user.username}, password=#{user.password}, nickname=#{user.nickname}, email=#{user.email}, phone=#{user.phone}, status=#{user.status}, createDate=#{user.createDate} where id = #{user.id}
